description.english: Consume at least 40 wood by burning it.
description.schinese: 通过燃烧消耗至少40个木材

description.english: Consume at least 100 Plant Fuel by burning it.
description.schinese: 通过燃烧消耗至少100个植物燃料

description.english: Obtain at least 100 Titanium Ore by collecting Stone.
description.schinese: 通过采集石块获得至少100个钛石

description.english: Obtain at least 100 Silicon Ore by collecting Stone.
description.schinese: 通过采集石块获得至少100个硅石

description.english: Obtain at least 100 Organic Crystals by collecting plants.
description.schinese: 通过采集植物获得至少100个有机晶体

description.english: Obtain at least 100 Sulfuric Acid by collecting plants.
description.schinese: 通过采集植物获得至少100硫酸

description.english: Obtain at least 10 Carbon Nanotubes by collecting plants.
description.schinese: 通过采集植物获得至少10个碳纳米管

description.english: Make 20 Organic Crystals by hand using the original formula.
description.schinese: 使用原始公式手动制造20个有机晶体

description.english: Copy and save a Blueprint.
description.schinese: 复制并保存一张蓝图

description.english: Control 10 or more Construction Drones.
description.schinese: 控制超过10个以上建设机

description.english: Unlock upgrade to make the Solar Sail last 2 hours.
description.schinese: 解锁升级使太阳帆的寿命达到2小时

description.english: Unlock technology to make the construction latitude of the Dyson Sphere node reach 45 degrees.
description.schinese: 解锁科技使戴森球节点的修建纬度达到45度

description.english: Unlock upgrade to make mecha reach 12m/s movement speed.
description.schinese: 解锁升级使机甲的移动速度达到12m/s

description.english: Unlock upgrade allowing Sorters to carry 6 cargo at a time.
description.schinese: 解锁升级使极速分拣器每次可以运载6个货物

description.english: Discover 7 kinds of rare minerals, and collect at least 10 by hand.
description.schinese: 发现7种稀有矿物，并手动采集至少10个

description.english: Use the mineral burial function to bury at least 20 Veins.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏里利用矿物掩埋功能埋掉至少20个矿脉

description.english: Deplete 1 Vein.
description.schinese: 耗尽1个矿脉

description.english: Cover at least 12 Veins with one Mining machine.
description.schinese: 一个普通采矿机同时覆盖至少12个矿脉

description.english: Fill 10 tanks of fluid in a game.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏里装满10个储液罐的流体

description.english: Have at least 100 Logistics Drones for a planet in transit.
description.schinese: 行星上超过100个正在运输的物流运输机

displayName.schinese: 去吧，到其他星球把资源运回来

description.english: Have at least 50 Interstellar Logistics Vessels in space.
description.schinese: 太空中超过50艘正在运输的星际物流运输船

displayName.schinese: 忘了这颗星球没有大气

description.english: Build Wind Turbines on a planet with no atmosphere.
description.schinese: 在没有大气层的行星上建造风力涡轮机

description.english: Build a building at least 7 stories tall.
description.schinese: 建造一座超过7层的建筑

description.english: Use more than 80K foundations on a Waterworld planet.
description.schinese: 在任意一个水世界行星使用超过80K个地基

displayName.english: Don't sand so close to me

description.english: Collect at least 4M units of sand in a game.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏里收集至少4M个单位的沙土

displayName.english: I saw this in a movie once

description.english: Cover a planet with a Foundation.
description.schinese: 用地基铺满任意一个行星

description.english: Establish an Interstellar Logistics Transportation line.
description.schinese: 建立一条星际物流运输线

description.english: Establish 5 Interstellar Logistics Transportation lines between different planetary systems.
description.schinese: 在不同行星系之间建立5条星际物流运输线

description.english: Have Icarus’ energy below 5% for more than 3 minutes when on the ground.
description.schinese: 在地面上时，伊卡洛斯能量低于5%超过3分钟

displayName.schinese: 发生了什么? 我变成了太空垃圾!

description.english: Exhaust both fuel and energy while flying in space.
description.schinese: 在太空飞行时燃料和能量均耗尽

description.english: Manually collect 20 Hydrogen with Icarus on a Gas Giant while energy is at 5% or less.
description.schinese: 伊卡洛斯在能量低于5%的情况下，在气态巨星上手动采集20个氢

description.english: Have a mecha run out of energy and fall into water.
description.schinese: 机甲能量耗尽掉进水里

description.english: Use 12 Wireless Power Towers to charge a mecha at the same time.
description.schinese: 同时使用12个无线充电塔给机甲充电

description.english: Have Icarus burn at least 16 different fuels in a game.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏里，伊卡洛斯燃烧过至少16种不同的燃料

displayName.english: I can see my house from here!

description.english: Get Icarus 40m above sea level without entering flight mode.
description.schinese: 在不进入飞行模式的状态下使伊卡洛斯站上40m的海拔高度

description.english: Exceed a sailing speed of 340m/s in the atmosphere.
description.schinese: 在大气层内航行速度超过340m/s

description.english: Reach a sailing speed of 3000m/s in non-warp transportation.
description.schinese: 在非曲速飞行的状态下，航行速度达到3000m/s

description.english: Name a planet.
description.schinese: 命名一颗行星

description.english: Leave the original planet and land on another within an hour.
description.schinese: 在1小时内离开初始行星，登陆另外一个行星

displayName.english: Where no coal has gone before

description.english: Use coal as the only fuel to move from one planet to another.
description.schinese: 使用煤作为唯一燃料从一个行星出发，登陆另外一个行星

description.english: Start warp engine.
description.schinese: 完成一次曲速飞行

description.english: Land on another planet outside the initial planetary system before unlocking Warp drive.
description.schinese: 在解锁曲率引擎前，登陆初始行星系以外的另一个行星

description.english: Land on 5 different planets!
description.schinese: 登陆5种不同的行星

description.english: Land on 15 different planets!
description.schinese: 登陆15种不同的行星

description.english: Find and land on a planet with day and night tidal locking.
description.schinese: 找到并登陆一颗潮汐锁定永昼永夜的行星

description.english: Find and land on a planet rotating on a horizontal axis.
description.schinese: 找到并登陆一颗横躺自转的行星

description.english: Find and land on a planet rotating on a reverse axis.
description.schinese: 找到并登陆一颗反向自转的行星

displayName.english: Are you proud of me, Stephen?

description.english: Find and orbit a Black Hole.
description.schinese: 找到并绕行一个黑洞

description.english: Find and orbit a Neutron Star.
description.schinese: 找到并绕行一颗中子星

description.english: Travel to the planetary system farthest from your original system.
description.schinese: 游历距离初始星系最远的星系

description.english: Travel to at least 32 planetary systems in a game.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏里游历至少32个星系

description.english: Light an Artificial Star on the North and South Pole of the original planet, an Ice Field Gelisol Planet, and the eternal night side of a tide-locked planet.
description.schinese: 分别在初始行星的南极、北极，冰原冻土行星以及潮汐锁定行星的永夜面点亮一颗人造恒星

description.english: Use Icarus' garbage clearing function to absorb 50,000 units of Iron Ingot at the same time.
description.schinese: 使用垃圾清扫功能，在伊卡洛斯身上同时吸附50000个单位的铁块

description.english: Drop 3000 units of Titanium Ingot at once while flying through space.
description.schinese: 在太空飞行时，一次性掉落3000个单位的钛块

displayName.english: Build it and they will come

description.english: Build 10 Orbital Collectors.
description.schinese: 建造10座轨道采集器

description.english: Build and maintain 100 Ray Receivers with a receiving efficiency of over 85%.
description.schinese: 建造并维持100个接收效率达到85%以上的射线接收站

description.english: Achieve a Matrix Lab upload rate of 1M hash/s.
description.schinese: 矩阵研究站上传速率达到1M哈希/秒

description.english: Unlock upgrade to decrease the mineral mining consumption rate to less than 15%.
description.schinese: 解锁升级使采矿的矿物消耗率低于15%

description.english: Don't dismantle the landing capsule before completing the game.
description.schinese: 在通关游戏前一直未拆除飞行舱

description.english: Unlock all technologies (upgrade Unlimited Technology at least once).
description.schinese: 解锁所有科技（无限升级科技至少升级一次）

description.english: Complete the game.
description.schinese: 通关游戏

description.english: Complete the game on x0.5 resource difficulty.
description.schinese: 使用0.5倍资源难度通关游戏

description.english: Complete the game within 25 hours on x1 (or less) resource difficulty.
description.schinese: 使用1倍（或以下）资源难度在25小时内通关游戏

description.english: Complete the game within 10 hours on x1 (or less) resource difficulty.
description.schinese: 使用1倍（或以下）资源难度在10小时内通关游戏

description.english: Complete the game without launching a Solar Sail.
description.schinese: 不发射一个太阳帆通关

description.english: Complete the game without using Foundations.
description.schinese: 不使用地基通关

description.english: Complete the game without gathering rare veins to obtain rare ores.
description.schinese: 不通过采集稀有矿脉获得稀有矿物通关

description.english: Launch a total of 100K Solar Sails.
description.schinese: 累计发射100K个太阳帆

description.english: Launch a total of 30,000 Small Carrier Rockets.
description.schinese: 累计发射30000个小型运载火箭

description.english: Produce a total of 60,000 Critical Photons.
description.schinese: 累计生产60000个临界光子

description.english: Upload a total of 1M Universe matrices.
description.schinese: 累计上传1M个宇宙矩阵

description.english: Upload a total of 10M Universe matrices.
description.schinese: 累计上传10M个宇宙矩阵

description.english: Use Fractionators to produce at least 100K Deuterium per hour on a single planet.
description.schinese: 在单一行星上利用分馏塔每小时产出至少100K重氢

description.english: Produce at least 43,200 Electromagnetic turbines per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少43200个电磁涡轮

description.english: Produce at least 43,200 Electromagnetic matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少43200个电磁矩阵

description.english: Produce at least 43,200 Energy matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少43200个能量矩阵

description.english: Produce at least 43,200 Structure matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少43200个结构矩阵

description.english: Produce at least 43,200 Information matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少43200个信息矩阵

description.english: Produce at least 43,200 Gravity matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少43200个引力矩阵

description.english: Produce at least 21,600 Universe matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少21600个宇宙矩阵

description.english: Produce at least 43,200 Universe matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少43200个宇宙矩阵

description.english: Produce at least 108,000 Universe matrices per hour.
description.schinese: 每小时产出至少108000个宇宙矩阵

displayName.schinese: 没有煤? 放心，有风力涡轮机

description.english: Generate more than 60MW of electricity on a planet using Wind Turbines.
description.schinese: 在一个行星上使用风力涡轮机达到60MW以上的发电量

description.english: Generate more than 180MW of electricity on a planet using Solar Panels.
description.schinese: 在一个行星上使用太阳能板达到180MW以上的发电量

description.english: Achieve discharge power of more than 300MW on a planet using Energy Hubs.
description.schinese: 在一个行星上使用能量枢纽达到300MW以上的放电功率

description.english: Generate more than 600MW of power on a planet using Mini Fusion Power Plants.
description.schinese: 在一个行星上使用微型聚变发电站达到600MW以上的发电量

displayName.english: Like a diamond in the sky

description.english: Light a star that belongs to you in the Milky Way View.
description.schinese: 在银河系视图中点亮属于你的一颗星

displayName.schinese: 主脑需要更多的能量 I

description.english: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 200MW.
description.schinese: 戴森球的总发电性能达到200MW

displayName.schinese: 主脑需要更多的能量 II

description.english: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 1GW.
description.schinese: 戴森球的总发电性能达到1GW

displayName.schinese: 主脑需要更多的能量 III

description.english: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 1TW.
description.schinese: 戴森球的总发电性能达到1TW

displayName.english: We can make it if we try
displayName.schinese: 哪颗恒星都能建戴森球

description.english: Build a Dyson Sphere around a Red Giant star with a power generation performance of more than 10GW.
description.schinese: 建造一个包裹红巨星的戴森球，发电性能达到10GW以上

description.english: Build a Star Cluster with an energy storage capacity of 27GJ or more.
description.schinese: 全星区蓄电量超过27GJ

description.english: Reach a total power generation of 20MW.
description.schinese: 总发电性能达到20MW

description.english: Reach a total power generation of 100MW.
description.schinese: 总发电性能达到100MW

description.english: Reach a total power generation of 1GW.
description.schinese: 总发电性能达到1GW

description.english: Reach a total power generation of 5GW.
description.schinese: 总发电性能达到5GW

description.english: Reach a total power generation of 50GW.
description.schinese: 总发电性能达到50GW

description.english: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1GJ.
description.schinese: 总计耗能超过1GJ

description.english: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1TJ.
description.schinese: 总计耗能超过1TJ

description.english: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1PJ.
description.schinese: 总计耗能超过1PJ
